meanings.definition: All the inhabitants of a particular town, area, or country.
meanings.sent1: The population of our small town is around 5,000 people.
meanings.sent2: The population of the city keeps growing each year.
meanings.sent3: The population of squirrels in the park seems to be having a meeting today.
meanings.sent4: The population of stars in the night sky is breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The population of ants marching in a line was mesmerizing to watch.

meanings.definition: The total number of people inhabiting a country, city, or any district or area.
meanings.sent1: The world population is over 7 billion people.
meanings.sent2: The population of this country is diverse and vibrant.
meanings.sent3: The population of students in the library suddenly erupted into a dance party.
meanings.sent4: The population of ideas in her mind was like a bustling marketplace.
meanings.sent5: The population of cars on the highway during rush hour was overwhelming.
